articles.title: Harnaaz Sandhu dons traditional Vietnamese dress Ao Dai for Miss Universe Vietnam, says it reminds her of Punjabi suit - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Miss Universe Harnaaz Sandhu donned the traditional Vietnamese dress Ao Dai for attending a Miss Universe Vietnam event in the Southeast Asian country. A video of the star showed her saying that the ensemble reminded her of a Punjabi suit. | Fashion Trends
articles.content: Miss Universe 2021 winner Harnaaz Sandhu jetted off to Vietnam to attend Miss Universe Vietnam 2022 pageant. The beauty queen landed in the Southeast Asian country recently, and since then, she has b… [+2125 chars]

articles.title: 'Are ya ready, kids?': Kang Daniel announces collaboration with SpongeBob SquarePants - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The singer will be designed as an animated character in a series of merchandise that will be available for a limited time from Jun 24.

articles.description: Thirty-five years later, Astley is singing it this summer on tour with New Kids On The Block, Salt-N-Pepa and En Vogue for the 57-date “The Mixtape Tour 2022” in the US.
